alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Hills; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 10:17PM PST until December 27 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 7 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Local gusts up to 60 mph over the ridges and peaks. * WHERE...Marin Coastal Range, Sonoma Coastal Range, North Bay Interior Mountains, Coastal North Bay, Including Point Reyes National Seashore, the City of San Francisco, San Mateo Peninsula, East Bay Hills, and the Santa Cruz Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 PM Monday to 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These winds are associated with a strong frontal boundary that will produce heavy rain on Saturday. Strongest winds are expected along the immediate San Mateo Coastline, the Santa Cruz Mountains and the interior East Bay and Santa Clara ranges.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
